about_the_game:
Settle in by the crackling glow of Virtual Interactive Fireplace, a nostalgic and cozy simulation that turns any screen into a peaceful hearthside retreat. With just a click, light the fire and let the warmth of retro-inspired graphics fill the room. Listen as gentle pops and flickers mingle with ambient crackles, offering a sensory escape perfect for cozy autumn nights, chilly winter evenings, or festive holiday gatherings.

Whether you use it to create ambiance during a holiday party, unwind after a long day, or enjoy a moment of peaceful solitude, this interactive fireplace fills your space with calm and warmth. Perfect for gamers, holiday lovers, or anyone seeking a little peace, this cozy simulation captures the spirit of gathering around a fire without ever needing to leave your seat.

How to Play:

  • Place the tinder in the fireplace first.

  • Light a match and use it to ignite the tinder.

  • Use the burning tinder to light the logs.

  • Logs will catch fire, and your cozy fire will start!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 or NVIDIA GeForce GTX 550 Ti
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti or AMD equivalent
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
